net.theblackchamber.crypto.providers

Class EncryptionProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.theblackchamber.crypto.providers.EncryptionProvider
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AESEncryptionProvider, DESEdeEncryptionProvider

    public abstract class EncryptionProvider
extends Object
    Abstract class which will be the base for all Encryption providers. This is kinda un-needed at the moment but I am adding it to support future plans to allow more dynamic configuration of encryption used in utilities.
    Author:
    sminogue
